xmlns="http://www.sitemaps.org/schemas/sitemap/0.9" xmlns="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-image/1.1" xmlns:video="http://www.google.com/schemas/sitemap-video/1.1">
https://tmrev.io/movie/318457-Curse of the Seven Jackals 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500null While serving as a test subject for a synthetic blood product, Bernard (Kevin Barnes) waits for each of his injections inside a suburban motel room. He develops a friendship with the helpful maid (Jill Carnes), but being a medical guinea pig gradually takes its toll on Bernard's sanity. Soon, he believes he's a mummy whose synthetic blood will grant him eternal life. Chris Jolly directs this indie horror flick shot in minimalist black-and-white. Curse of the Seven Jackals
